pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kokanade pāsāde sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.5: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.7: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.8: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.11: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.14.1: “Na sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.16: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk56:1.22: uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍeti,
